text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa……I need to hurry, otherwise the teacher will get mad~! 
Of all times, it had to be my turn to take the trash out……!
text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
Wah! ……Whoa. What's wrong? 
You look really worried.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Class Rep Top Road! Sorry, I was in a hurry…… 
Earlier, the teacher called for me since I have an interview soon……
text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
Ah, in that case, I'll throw the trash away! 
Go ahead and head to the teacher!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Eh!? ……Really? Then……can I ask you to do it? 
I'll definitely make it up to you later!
text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, you don't need to thank me. Something like this'll 
be over in an instant! Do your best in the interview!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
While I was working, I overheard the conversation 
outside my window. And it made me smile.

I turned back to the paperwork that I was working on. 
When I finished, I headed out on to the grounds.
However, when I passed by the garbage area――

Narita Top Road was standing there. There were 
several crows gathered around the bird net 
that prevented them from getting to the garbage.

…………Don't look at them, ignore them. 
Approach quietly……and then just leave……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Caaaaw.
text_block_list.name: Crow

text_block_list.text: Uwaaah!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: ……Huuuuuーーー…………it's fine, it's fine……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Caaaaaaaaw.
text_block_list.name: Crow

text_block_list.text: Ah, T-Trainer-san……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Um, well yeah……when I was a kid, one of them scared me…… 
Even now, I still get reminded of that time……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: ……But when it comes to crows, I can't help it though……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Eh? You don't need to, I'd feel bad!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
choice_data_list: I'm fine with crows. Let me do it.
I'm fine with crows. Let me do it.

text_block_list.text:
……You really helped me out. 
Really, thank you for that.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Aaah~, I'm pathetic! If you hadn't come, 
I'd probably still……really, really, thanks alot!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
choice_data_list: This isn't a big deal though……

text_block_list.text:
While it was praiseworthy that she was doing something 
that was left to her and trying to deal with something 
she was bad with, seeing how she was earlier……

……Well, it was a task I had accepted. 
I thought I needed to see it through to the end.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Well, yeah……even so, 
I couldn't just leave the trash somewhere else.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
And besides, the girl who left it to me, 
I think she believed that I'd see it through to the end.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: ――In which case, I wanted to live up to those expectations.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
No matter how difficult or troublesome. 
I think that's the duty of someone who's being relied upon!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Living up to expectations makes it all worthwhile!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: ……though, I guess it's not very convincing when you had to come help me.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
choice_data_list: No, I think it's a great mindset

text_block_list.text:
Thanks alot. 
So I'm not just all talk, I'll do my best!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
She had a strong sense of responsibility and 
desire to improve. While that was a good thing―― 
I did wish she'd rely on others a little more.
